remarks: Ordering relationship for exponentiation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
resqcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltexp2d.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
ltexp2d.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) $.
ltexp2d.4 $e |- ( ph -> 1 < A ) $.
ltexp2d $p |- ( ph -> ( M < N <-> ( A ^ M ) < ( A ^ N ) ) ) $.
